questions.question: In recursion, the condition for which the function will stop calling itself is ____________

explanations.a: For recursion to end at some point, there always has to be a condition for which the function will not call itself. This condition is known as base case.

questions.question: Recursion is a method in which the solution of a problem depends on ____________

answers.b: Larger instances of the same problem
answers.c: Smaller instances of the same problem

explanations.c: In recursion, the solution of a problem depends on the solution of smaller instances of the same problem.
